column5: Our place is walking distance to coffee shops, bakeries, restaurants, shops and Central Market grocery. We are within three miles of three art museums, the children's museum and botanical gardens. We are five miles from downtown, the Alamo, the Riverwalk and the zoo. Our charming 1910 home is in the historic Alamo Heights neighborhood. You can relax outside in our huge backyard. We welcome couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and well-behaved furry friends (pets).
column8: Alamo Heights Craftsman Haus 5 miles from downtown
